comments: This kind of counting sequence is always eventually periodic with period 1, 2 or 3. - Herve Lehning (lehning(AT)noos.fr), Oct 01 2003
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1).
Herve Lehning, Computer-aided or analytic proof?, College Mathematics Journal, Vol. 21, No. 3, 1990, pp. 228-239.
example: The third term is 1110 because the second term contains one 1 and one 0.
author: _Floor van Lamoen_
